description: This is just the ListItem component exported from the Menu module for convenience. You can use `ListItem` or `SimpleListItem` components from the List section as long as you add `role="menuitem"` and `tabIndex="0"` to the components for accessibility.
A menu component for displaying lists items.

onSelect.description: Callback that fires when a Menu item is selected.

anchorCorner.description: Manually position the menu to one of the corners.

onOpen.description: Callback for when the menu is opened.

onClose.description: Callback for when the menu is closed.

description: A Menu Anchor. When using the anchorCorner prop of Menu, you must set MenuSurfaceAnchors css style position to absolute.
A Simplified menu component that allows you to pass a handle element and will automatically control the open state and add a MenuSurfaceAnchor

handle.description: An element that will open the menu when clicked

rootProps.description: By default, props spread to the Menu component. These will spread to the MenuSurfaceAnchor which is useful for things like overall positioning of the anchor.
